name: terminal_32
description:
In terminal_32, you are a hacker trying to get to the terminal. What stops you is a bunch of data walls and binary codes. At start, you have 32 seconds, but you can have flashing batteries to help you in your task. 

C:\> FEATURES      

  • randomly generated map 
  • local highscore with real timers to beat
  • pickups to help you reach the terminal before time is over
  • menu with real terminal simulation
  • two difficulty and two control settings

C:\> MENU COMMANDS

play easy - play hard - vol up - vol down - next page - move arrows - move wasd - reset - credits - back - duck

This is the first game I ever made. The initial prototype was made in two days for a NES Game Jam, and later polished to get the result I wanted. 

I have plans to invest some time a sequel for terminal_32, let me know what you think! Support and feedback are much appreciated.

Find me: facebook.com/rikematdev/ - rikematdev.tumblr.com/
